name: floe-webapp
description: A professional VSCode-style web application framework

scripts.build:demo: pnpm --filter @floegence/floe-webapp-core build && pnpm --filter @floegence/floe-webapp-protocol build && pnpm --filter @floegence/floe-webapp-demo build
scripts.deploy:demo: pnpm build:demo && pnpm dlx wrangler@^3 pages deploy apps/demo/dist --project-name webapp-demo
